All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
Abstract Data Access Object class for performing CRUD operations on a database table.
Bill
Represents a bill.
Client
Represents a Client entity.
ClientAgeValidator
Validator for validating the age of a client.
ClientBLL
Business logic class for managing clients.
ClientDAO
Data Access Object for handling operations related to the Client entity in the database.
ConnectionFactory
A utility class for managing database connections.
EmailValidator
 
Main
The main class of the application.
Order
Represents an Order entity.
OrderBLL
Business logic class for managing orders.
OrderDAO
Data Access Object for handling operations related to the Order entity in the database.
Product
Represents a Product entity.
ProductBLL
Business logic class for managing products.
ProductDAO
Data Access Object for handling operations related to the Product entity in the database.
Reflection
A utility class that provides methods for working with reflection and JTable.

Validator<T>
 
View
The main view of the management system.
ViewClients
The ViewClients class represents the graphical user interface for managing clients.
ViewOrders
Represents the view for managing orders.
ViewProducts
The ViewProducts class represents the graphical user interface for managing products.
